SEARCH
Package jpa.entities

Class Ticket

java.lang.Object
jpa.entities.BaseEntity
jpa.entities.Ticket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class Ticket extends BaseEntity
Sellable ticket for a single concert.

A ticket is available while sold = false and can later be associated with a customer once purchased.

See Also:
